staxel.village.character.dialogue.RiahRo: I think it's time I let you in on a little secret, mya...
There's something I like more that fish.
Wait. Nope, mya. Can't say it.
What fish should I cook for dinner tonight, mya?
I can make whatever you want, mya!
I'm sorry about the furniture, mya...
I didn't mean to claw it... It just kind of happened mya...
